Title: Caps the monthly maximum payment for hotel rooms to house homeless persons
Summary: Caps the monthly maximum payment for hotel rooms to house homeless persons based upon the New York city housing authority Section 8 voucher payment standards.
LawCode: Add ยง43-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to capping the monthly maximum payment for hotel rooms to house homeless persons
